details.n: The Demon King's Daughter is Too Kind!!

ratings.en: The Demon King's Daughter is Too Kind!! / The Demon King's Daughter Helps Too Much!!
The Demon King's Daughter Must Shrewdly Oppress the Humans!! / The Demon King's Advisor Teaches Too Well!!
Searching for a Familiar Is Too Difficult / The Pairika Is Too Sexy
Santa Is Handing Out Too Many Presents!! / The Demon King's Familiar Loves Humans Too Much!!
The Divine Messenger Is Too Much Trouble!! / The Divine Messenger (The Real One) Is Too Hot-Headed!!
